column4: Would I put the location of the file I am making after this line? ./configure && make && sudo make install
no, that's all you'd want. the make install reads the Makefile and puts files in place
compiling it won't work, because the packaging system still won't see you've installed that version of libcairomm
smartmontools (no gui, but the same guts)
the X log looks ok, it doesn't look like pulseaudio is causing the freeze; I'd suggest booting up the memtest and letting it run overnight. All my freezes have been memory related
not for vid cards that I remember. And one error didn't show till nearly the entire suite of tests had run. That takes hours.
